name: Software & Information Industry Association
goal: The Software & Information Industry Association (SIIA) represents over 700 firms in the technology sector, including Internet, software and content companies.  SIIA advocates for free trade with modern data flow provisions, harm-based data privacy rules, intellectual property protection, and multi-stakeholder Internet governance.
interests: Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
General Data Protection Regulation.

E-Privacy Regulation

U.S.-EU Privacy Shield.

Digital Single Market.

European Commission Copyright Consultation.

Transatlantic Trade and Investment Partnership

Fintech

Data Portability
